name: UniOne
description: Unione. is a minimal color-render puzzle with beautiful abstract shapes. Your goal is to render all nodes to same color in limit steps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
